cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 23rd Nov 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 23rd Nov 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

dorms.name: Deluxe 10 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Our ultra-comfortable beds are built on custom made wooden bunks and come with privacy curtains, handy storage drawers, charging facilities and a reading light. Beds will be immaculately made for you - just come as you are!

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Deluxe Twin Room Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Our Twin rooms are designed with comfort and privacy in mind. Relax with a friend in our ultra-comfortable beds and enjoy the social environment of our hostel at your leisure.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Deluxe Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Our private double rooms are perfect for those seeking for a sanctuary after a day of exploring beautiful Wellington. Our luxurious queen beds will have you dreaming all night!
